name: COLISEUM DEMO
description:
Coliseum is a first-person shooter in which the player controls a super-soldier. The soldier's goal is to destroy enemy factions' towers and the enemy base with his army.

Overview

Coliseum is a competitive first-person shooter MOBA game in which the player controls a futuristic hero with unique abilities. The player's goal is to push the battle lane by killing enemy characters, minions, and towers to destroy the enemy base.

How To Play Connecting to the Server:

To Playtest the game in the early phases of the production, players have to access our local server by using the Zero Tier app.

Download ZeroTier From the link below:
https://www.zerotier.com/download/

Join the network: 0cccb752f755edec

https://discord.gg/yd8XvHSpGK

Prototype 1 Controls: ActionKeyBoard + MouseMovementW,A,S,D Basic attackLeft Mouse Button Attacking to a TowerHolding V Return To BaseB JumpSpace Bar SprintShift
